item.description:
Bricco (http://www.bricco.com/) is one of the classier restaurants in the North End. It's also one of the most expensive. So we will dine on Restaurant Week, where the price for 3 courses is $33. (+tax, tip, drinks) Check out the Restaurant Week menu-

http://www.bricco.com/content/menu-rw.html There are 6 appetizers, 8 entrees and 2 desserts to choose from. You may also order off the regular menu, at regular prices.

We will meet at the rear of the bar between 6:00 and 7:00 for a cocktail hour and introductions. The restaurant is located on the 1st block of Hanover St. on the right-hand side as you're coming from the Greenway. The nearest T-stop is Haymarket (Green & Orange Lines). The best place to park is the Parcel 7 Garage (entrance on Sudbury St.) It's $3 for 3 hours-validated. http://www.parkingcarma.com/parking_lots/136-BLACKSTONE-ST_Boston/d3eedbcc-b80b-dc11-bcd7-0013723eb578/ It would be best to bring cash, as we will not get separate checks.

Please join us for a lavish Italian meal in Boston's North End.

NOTE: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the rear of the bar.
item.name: Bricco-Restaurant Week Dinner
